short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline your recruitment process. Manage candidates, create projects, and optimize your hiring workflow with TalentAQ.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify your recruitment process with this powerful Chrome extension.

What It Does:
This extension allows you to collect candidate resumes from Linkedin & Internshala. It automatically aggregates information into one centralized location, saving you time and streamlining your hiring workflow.

Why You Should Install It:

1. Save Time: Gather candidate information from various sources instantly, eliminating manual data entry.

2. Improve Efficiency: Consolidate data from multiple platforms into one place, reducing the need to switch between tabs or applications.

3. Enhance Collaboration: Easily share aggregated candidate information with your team, improving the hiring process.

4. Reduce Errors: Minimize the risk of overlooking qualified candidates or duplicating efforts across platforms.

5. Seamless Integration: Works perfectly with our website, where you can further manage and filter your candidate pool.

Designed for recruiters, HR professionals, and hiring managers who want to optimize their talent acquisition process. Install now to transform your hiring workflow and find the right talent faster than ever!# One-Click Candidate Aggregator

Simplify your recruitment process with this powerful Chrome extension.
